bug.author: rakeshmothukuru1
bug.summary: ImportError: cannot import name 'np_utils' in ImageDataGenerator
bug.description:

comments.comment: Was able to reproduce the issue with TF v2.3 and TF-nightly. Please find the gist of it <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/gist/amahendrakar/31e386806706356954977ff2f431015e/44765.ipynb>here</denchmark-link> . Thanks!
